pr_title: DHFPROD-4177: Create new structured type property

timeline.message: DHFPROD-4177: Create new structured type property

timeline.bodyText:
For future, if we are using data-testid, then try using cy.findByTestId
Our framework now imports  custom Cypress commands from RTL.
timeline.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: Got it. I can do some refactoring the next time I do a commit.
replies.author: brucean52
